string:
[High:%shipname] can create a wormhole towards the fleets nearest planet or star on command.
To accomplish this, it [High:consumes %strangeMatterRequired pieces of strange matter] within the storage of the ship.

After [High:%shipname] creates a wormhole, it will travel through it. The wormhole itself is temporary, only [High:allowing passage through it for a short time.]

It currently holds [contextcolor:%strangeMatterHeld] stacks of strange matter on its deck.
